document_data.title: Honor Among Thieves: Official Activity Book
document_data.author: Random House
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Honor Among Thieves: Official Activity Book''''' is an activity and sticker book based on the ''[[Honor Among Thieves]]'' movie set to be released on February 28, 2023. It is intended for children aged 3–7.
{{quote|
'''This full-color activity book is based on the film ''Dungeons & Dragons: Honor Among Thieves'' ­– in theaters March 3, 2023!'''

''Dungeons & Dragons: Honor Among Thieves'' is an upcoming high-fantasy heist film based on the popular role-playing game! Co-written and co-directed by [[Jonathan Goldstein]] and [[John Francis Daley]] (''Spider-Man: Homecoming'', ''Game Night''), and produced by [[Jeremy Latcham]] (''Spider-Man: Homecoming'', ''Guardians of the Galaxy''), the film stars [[Chris Pine]], [[Michelle Rodriguez]], [[Hugh Grant]], [[Regé-Jean Page]], [[Justice Smith]], and [[Sophia Lillis]]. Kids ages 3 to 7 will love this full-color activity book with more than 50 stickers.|Publisher's description}}
